deepLinks.name: Commitment to Clean
deepLinks.snippet: At Marriott, food handlers and supervisors are trained on safe food preparation and service practices. The company's food and beverage operations are required to conduct self-inspection using its food safety standards as guidelines, and compliance is validated by independent audits. Marriott is also enhancing sanitation guidelines and training ...

deepLinks.name: Downtown Atlanta Hotel Suites
deepLinks.snippet: Atlanta Marriott Marquis offers over 1,600 renovated hotel rooms near the aquarium in Atlanta. Take in fantastic views of the skyline, catch up on your shows thanks to steaming service connectivity and get a good night's sleep on comfortable plush bedding.

value.name: Atlanta Marriott Marquis - Wikipedia
value.snippet: The Atlanta Marriott Marquis is a 47-story, 168.86 m (554.0 ft) Marriott hotel in Atlanta, Georgia, United States.It is the 15th tallest skyscraper in the city. The building was designed by Atlanta architect John C. Portman Jr. with construction completed in 1985, and because of its bulging base, it is often referred to as the "Pregnant Building" or the "Coca Cola" building as it looks like a ...

value.name: Book Atlanta Marriott Marquis in Atlanta | Hotels.com
value.snippet: Yes, Atlanta Marriott Marquis does have fully refundable room rates available to book on our site. If you’ve booked a fully refundable room rate, this can be cancelled up to a few days before check-in depending on the property's cancellation policy. Just make sure to check this property's cancellation policy for the exact terms and conditions.

value.name: Welcome to the Atlanta Marriott Marquis
value.description: Welcome to the newly renovated Atlanta Marriott Marquis hotel. Almost 160,000 square feet of revitalized space. 1,663 new, state-of-the-art guest rooms (including 94 spacious suites). Beautiful spa & 24-hour fitness center. Unique dining options. All 15 minutes from the Hartsfield-Jackson International Airport. Your journey beings here.
